page.title: 18Employment
page.content: In this period of high unemployment we can report that it is not yet a major difficulty for the people living in our block.One of the reasons for this is the high incidence of retired persons and another being the stability of the major employers,I.C.I. and the local farms and small industries.The younger people will tell you that it is a worry for them until they find a job, but the Youth Training Scheme and the Job Opportunities Programme do seem to provide the extra chances for them.Within the area there are the following employers: 1.John Fausset Ltd -precast concrete manufacture -7 employees. 1.Wyre Glass -glass merchants,manufactures of replacement windows and doors,double glazing using wood,aluminium,and upvc -12 employees.
